participant_1.background:

I'm going to be working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel.

content.text: Not bad, just hanging out. How about you?
I'm doing well. Just got back from the gym.
Nice! I love working out, but I haven't had time lately.
Yeah, I know how that goes. I try to go at least three times a week, but it can be tough.
It's definitely worth it though. I feel so much better when I work out.
Same here. I'm always in a better mood after I work out.
What kind of workouts do you like to do?
I like to do a mix of cardio and strength training. I'll usually do some running or biking, and then lift weights.
Nice! I like to do a lot of cardio too. I like running and dancing.
I love dancing! It's so much fun.
Yeah, it is! It's a great way to get exercise and have fun at the same time.
Exactly! I wish I could dance more often, but I don't have a lot of time.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I wish I could dance more too.
Well, we should try to make more time for it!
That would be fun! I'd love to dance with you sometime.
